api_list.name: Orbit
Launch Sites
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uphere-space1.p.rapidapi.com/satellite/list/launch-sites"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uphere-space1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uphere-space1.p.rapidapi.com/satellite/43226/details"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uphere-space1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://uphere-space1.p.rapidapi.com/satellite/{number}/details"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uphere-space1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
